comment.author: 26033330@N00
comment._content: Pity it doesn't give the year, but seems to be 1950s judging the actor's age in this shot, and the suit. A really great capture.

comment.author: 69310932@N08
comment._content: This would have been circa 1956, as the movie appeared in 1957.  This is Jimmy Stewart, not sure about the gent to his immediate right, but pretty sure that the fellow on the far right, is T. Claude Ryan - the founder of RYAN AIRCRAFT - the builder of the original Spirit of St. Louis.
